channel.title: JOONBUM LEE on JOONBUM LEE
channel.description: Recent content in JOONBUM LEE on JOONBUM LEE

item.title: SHRP2 IAP Phase 2
item.description:
SHRP 2 Implementation Assistance Program

Concept to Countermeasure – Research to Deployment Using the SHRP2 Safety Data (NDS) Influence of Roadway Design Features on Episodic Speeding in Washington State

My responsibilities in this project includes

  • Data reduction for GPS/RID data
  • Data visualization
  • Exprolatory analysis
  • Statistical anlysis to investigate relationships between roadway characteristics and speeding behavior

item.title: SHINY APP: Comparison of speeding measures across 104 traveled ways
item.description: This Shiny app allows users to test/visualize relationships between roadway characteristics and speeding measures across 104 traveled ways. This app requires authentication.

item.title: SHINY APP: Drivers' sensation seeking, glance, and driving behavior
SHINY APP: Roadway characteristics and speeding behavior
item.description: This Shiny app allows users to test/visualize relationships between roadway characteristics and speeding measures across 104 traveled ways. This app requires authentication.

item.title: Linking the Detection Response Task and the AttenD Algorithm through the Assessment of Human-Machine Interface Workload
Relationships between older drivers’ cognitive abilities as assessed on the MoCA and glance patterns during visual-manual radio tuning while driving
Sensation Seeking and Drivers’ Glance Behavior while Engaging in a Secondary Task
